[event]
# Teleport to Volcano1
type=teleport
location=31,25,1,5
intermap=volcano1.txt,1,16

[event]
# Forge
type=run_once
location=4,19,1,1
hotspot=-16,-16,32,32
loot=id,5,19,198
requires_not=skelkey
tooltip=Anvil

[event]
# Teleport to VolcanoA
type=teleport
location=5,0,11,1
intermap=volcanoa.txt,5,30

[enemy]
# Skeleton with Key
type=skeleton
location=5,19,1,1
level=1,1
number=1,1

[enemy]
# Skeleton Knight
type=skeletonknight
location=22,2,1,1
level=2,2
number=1,1

[enemygroup]
# 2 firebats
type=bat
location=7,17,4,5
level=2,2
number=2,2
